subject: Running
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Deena Kastor stormed to the finish line to win the Olympic trials in 2:29:35 while Lewy Boulet, whose lead was once as large as two minutes on Kastor and the pack, easily held on for second place.
snippet: Deena Kastor stormed to the finish line to win the Olympic trials in 2:29:35 while Lewy Boulet, whose lead was once as large as two minutes on Kastor and the pack, easily held on for second place.
